content: 6 held sts back on needles pick round 4 k up 2 sts from gap on mitten 8 sts work round 5 k3 m1 k to last 3 sts m1 k3 in st st 7 rnds in 8th round k2tog across 28 sts round 4 sts cut yarn leaving tail pull tail round 6 k through 4 sts and pull to close gap work mitten upper work in any loose ends block as round 1 k to last 3 sts place the last 3 necessary sts and the following first 3 sts on holder for thumb join and knit rem 22 sts work a further 3 in st st or until mitten is 1 ½ shorter than desired length to finger tips enjoy the pattern and photographs contained in this document are the property of cocoknits this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed copyright © 2009 www cocoknits com copyright © 2008 cocoknits com smitten page 2 of 2
